name: Intune Documentation
description: A free web application that generates comprehensive PDF documentation for Microsoft Intune configurations. Automatically exports all configuration types including device configurations, compliance policies, security baselines, PowerShell scripts, and Conditional Access Policies with full settings, assignments, and filters. Features customizable branding with logos, colors, headers, and footers. Uses read-only OAuth 2.0 authentication with no persistent data storage.
author: Ugur Koc
